title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh mangoes 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 2.87 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Per capita consumption in pounds about 1.88 was reached at Year 2005
